        character - : CharacterCatalogue instance.
        team - : Team assigned to the user
        virtuality - : boolean indicating if the user is commanded by a real user or if it is virtual.

    • Method Detail

      • draftTeamMember

        public T draftTeamMember()
        draftTeamMember drafts a member of the Team that belongs to the user by performing the decision according to its virtuality
        Returns:
        member of the user team that we are drafting.

      • hasLost

        public boolean hasLost()
        hasLost method determines if the user has lost the encounter he is in. This is determined if there are no activeMembers remaining in his team. When no activeMembers remain in his team then it is considered that the user has lost.
        Returns:
        boolean saying if the user has lost (true) or not (false)

      • remainsPlayer

        public boolean remainsPlayer()
        remainsPlayer returns a boolean indicating if there is a real player associated to the user which remains in the game.
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if remains a real player (true) or not (false)
